content: crochet pussyhat materials chunky yarn 6mm crochet hook or what works well with your yarn yarn needle for weaving in ends and sewing seams sewing seams is optional abbreviations chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet in - inches single_crochet - single_crochet blo - back loop only only work into the back loop of the stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch hhdc - herringbone half_double_crochet you can replace this stitch with half_double_crochet or single_crochet if desired instructions ribbing leave a long tail for joining and make 17 chain or 4ins plus 2ch for turning row 1- half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each chain across 15hdc row 2 - 2ch does not count as stitch here or elsewhere half_double_crochet across in blo 15hdc repeat row 2 until work measures 20in or fits comfortably round the head bring the first row of the ribbing up to join with the current row and sew or crochet the two ends together you can use single_crochet or slip_stitch but if you are crocheting make sure you allow for the fact that the seam will create a bit of extra ease in your work top of hat round 1 - turn work and place three single_crochet in every two row ends i e 1 5 stitches per row end make sure you only pick up one loop of any stitches or there will be obvious holes at end of round slip_stitch to first st ch1 round 2 - hhdc into every stitch around when you reach the last stitch just go straight on into the first stitch of the round so that you are working in a spiral with no join continue to work in hhdc until the hat measures 8 ins from base to top slip_stitch to the next stitch to create a smooth line join along top seam by sewing or slip_stitch or single_crochet the finished object looks like a flat rectangle but the ears pop up when you put it on your head
